fields.name: Taal Weavers Cooperative
fields.short_description: Handwoven embroidery and traditional crafts from Taal
fields.about_shop: Taal Weavers Cooperative preserves the art of Taal embroidery and weaving, creating intricate handmade pieces passed down through generations.
fields.vision: To preserve and promote the traditional weaving culture of Taal for future generations.
fields.mission: To empower local artisans through sustainable livelihoods and global appreciation of Taal craftsmanship.

fields.name: Lipa Clayworks Studio
fields.short_description: Handmade pottery and ceramic home décor
fields.about_shop: Lipa Clayworks Studio produces handmade ceramic pieces inspired by local landscapes and traditional Filipino pottery.
fields.vision: To bring Batangueño artistry into every home through functional art.
fields.mission: To support local potters by providing fair trade opportunities and modern design training.

fields.name: Bauan Bamboo Crafts
fields.about_shop: Bauan Bamboo Crafts focuses on eco-friendly bamboo products designed for modern homes while supporting local craftsmen.
fields.vision: To promote sustainable living through bamboo craftsmanship.
fields.mission: To innovate and popularize bamboo as a versatile material for eco-conscious consumers.

fields.name: Alitagtag Handicraft Corner
fields.about_shop: A small community-based shop making abaca bags, woven ornaments, and decor with modern Filipino flair.
fields.vision: To connect Batangas craftsmanship with contemporary Filipino style.
fields.mission: To empower local women artisans through livelihood and creativity.

fields.name: Nasugbu Coastal Crafts
fields.about_shop: Nasugbu Coastal Crafts creates coastal-inspired décor using locally sourced shells and driftwood.
fields.vision: To celebrate Batangas’ coastal beauty through sustainable craftsmanship.
fields.mission: To provide livelihood for coastal families while protecting marine resources.

fields.name: Batangas Basketry Hub
fields.about_shop: A family-run enterprise specializing in rattan and buri baskets for home and lifestyle use.
fields.vision: To make Batangas the leading source of quality handwoven products.
fields.mission: To promote eco-friendly practices and preserve basketry traditions.

fields.name: San Juan Handmade Textiles
fields.about_shop: Specializes in handloom textiles using traditional patterns combined with contemporary designs.
fields.vision: To keep the handloom tradition alive through innovation.
fields.mission: To uplift weavers’ communities through fair trade and design education.

fields.name: Calaca Woodworks
fields.short_description: Custom wooden crafts and home décor
fields.about_shop: Calaca Woodworks creates handcrafted wooden décor, blending traditional techniques with modern minimalism.
fields.vision: To be a leading advocate of sustainable woodworking in Batangas.
fields.mission: To craft with purpose and preserve woodworking traditions through education.
